00051 void GL2VertexSet::setColourValues(float* cvals, enum ColourValueTypes type, unsigned int points)
00052 {
00053     if (m_colourVals != 0) delete[] m_colourVals;
00054 
00055     unsigned int arrSize = 0;
00056 
00057     if (type == ctype_float_rgb)
00058     {
00059             arrSize = points * 3;
00060     }
00061     else if (type == ctype_float_rgba)
00062     {
00063             arrSize = points * 4;
00064     }
00065     else
00066     {
00067         m_colourVals = 0;
00068         m_colourValuesType = ctype_none;
00069         m_numColourValues = 0;
00070         return;
00071     }
00072 
00073     m_colourVals = new GLfloat[arrSize];
00074     m_colourValuesType = type;
00075     m_numColourValues = points;
00076 
00077     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < arrSize; ++i)
00078     {
00079         m_colourVals[i] = cvals[i];
00080     }
00081 
00082     return;
00083 }

00141 void GL2VertexSet::Draw()
00142 {
00143     if (m_vertices == 0) return;
00144 
00145     if (m_indices != 0)
00146     {
00147         Draw(0, m_numIndices, TRIANGLES);
00148     }
00149     else
00150     {
00151         Draw(0, m_numVertices, TRIANGLES);
00152     }
00153 }

00155 void GL2VertexSet::Draw(unsigned int start, unsigned int number, PrimitiveTypes primitiveType)
00156 {
00157     if (m_vertices == 0) return;
00158 
00159     GLenum apiPrimType = 0;
00160 
00161     switch (primitiveType)
00162     {
00163         case QUADS:
00164             apiPrimType = GL_QUADS;
00165             break;
00166 
00167         case QUAD_STRIP:
00168             apiPrimType = GL_QUAD_STRIP;
00169             break;
00170 
00171         case TRIANGLES:
00172             apiPrimType = GL_TRIANGLES;
00173             break;
00174 
00175         case TRIANGLE_STRIP:
00176             apiPrimType = GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP;
00177             break;
00178 
00179         case LINES:
00180             apiPrimType = GL_LINES;
00181             break;
00182 
00183         case LINE_STRIP:
00184             apiPrimType = GL_LINE_STRIP;
00185             break;
00186 
00187         case POINTS:
00188             apiPrimType = GL_POINTS;
00189             break;
00190     }
00191 
00192     if (m_vertices != 0)
00193     {
00194         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00195         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, m_vertices);
00196     }
00197 
00198     if (m_texCoords != 0)
00199     {
00200 
00201         glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00202         glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, m_texCoords);
00203     }
00204 
00205     if (m_normals != 0)
00206     {
00207         glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00208         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, m_normals);
00209     }
00210 
00211     if (m_colourVals != 0)
00212     {
00213         glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
00214 
00215         if (m_colourValuesType == ctype_float_rgb)
00216 
00217             glColorPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, m_colourVals);
00218         else
00219             glColorPointer(4, GL_FLOAT, 0, m_colourVals);
00220     }
00221 
00222 
00223     if (m_indices != 0)
00224     {
00225        glDrawRangeElements(apiPrimType, start, start + number, number, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, m_indices);
00226     }
00227     else
00228     {
00229         glDrawArrays(apiPrimType, start, number);
00230     }
00231 
00232     glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00233     glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00234     glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00235     glDisableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
00236 }
